summary: On a arctic circle radio shack, an ancient evil lurks, ready to strike at a psychologist, an army man and their collective forces.
cast: Clayton Rohner|Faith Ford|Max Perlich|Chase Masterson|Damian Chapa|Jennifer O'Dell|Michael Stadvec|Stephen Hart|Douglas Stoup|Frank Ceglia
director: Director: Daniel Zelik Berk (as Daniel Berk)
title: Infierno blanco
